subproject.description: 1. Assess risks and impacts of climate-induces hydro-meteorological hazards in the Himalayan region. 2. Community-based climate risk reduction and preparedness measures identified and implemented. 3. Initiate the process for formulation of policy frameworks for climate risk reduction and promotion of regional and national networks for knowledge sharing and coordination.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
